original_text: A devout man, and one that feared God with all his house, which gave much alms to the people, and prayed to God alway.
korean_text: 그가 경건하여 온 집안과 더불어 하나님을 경외하며 백성을 많이 구제하고 하나님께 항상 기도하더니

sentences.original_text: and one that feared God with all his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 집안과 함께 하나님을 경외하는 자

sentences.original_text: which gave much alms to the people
